name: real-estate-team-plugins
description: A collection of plugins for real estate team leaders
author: Inside Real Estate

plugins.name: lead-generation
plugins.description: Build and manage marketing efforts to generate new leads

plugins.name: lead-management
plugins.description: Respond to leads, qualify, enrich, segment and manage the hygiene of your contacts

plugins.name: lead-nurture
plugins.description: Support nurturing leads through the sales process, including sending follow-up emails, making phone calls, and setting appointments, as well as providing tools to track and manage the lead's progress

plugins.name: presentation
plugins.description: Support moving a lead toward a signed agreement buyer or seller presentations, CMAs and drafting contracts

plugins.name: listing-marketing
plugins.description: Support sellers in order to drive maximum market exposure an dinterest, including drafting, publishing, promoting, showing listings and seller reports

plugins.name: buyer-tools
plugins.description: Support buyers with tools to find home, property alerts, pre-approvals, tours, plus neighbourhood and market reports

plugins.name: offer-management
plugins.description: Support drafting, negotiating, comparing and sending or receiving offers on behalf of buyers and seller

plugins.name: pre-close
plugins.description: Support coordinating transactions towards closing, including inspections, appraisals, financing, title, and closing documents

plugins.name: compliance
plugins.description: Support reviewing documents for completeness and accuracy so that the transactionw will close smoothlly

plugins.name: past-client-nurture
plugins.description: Support closing day gifts, check-ins, asking for reviews & referrals, as well as long-term nuture and sphere of inluence marketing

plugins.name: pipeline-management
plugins.description: Support managing the pipeline and agent performance, including tracking leads, follow-ups, appointments, showings, offers, and closings

plugins.name: team-building
plugins.description: Support building and managing a team with tools to manage meetings, events, trainings, emails, tasksand more

plugins.name: recruiting
plugins.description: Support recruiting new agents, including sourcing, screening, interviewing, and onboarding agents
